name: Helm of the Alabaster Unicorn
description: Worn on the head, this item increases your Knowledge skill by +1.

name: Skull Helmet
description: Worn on the head, this item increases your Knowledge skill by +2.

name: Helm of Chaos
description: Worn on the head, this item increases your Knowledge skill by +3.

name: Crown of the Supreme Magi
description: Worn on the head, this item increases your Knowledge skill by +4.

name: Hellstorm Helmet
description: Worn on the head, this item increases your Knowledge skill by +5.

name: Crown of Dragontooth
description: Worn on the head, this item increases your Knowledge and Power skills by +4.

name: Thunder Helmet
description: When worn, this relic increases your Knowledge skill by +10, but reduces your Power skill by -2.

name: Helm of Heavenly Enlightenment
description: Worn on the head, the Helm of Heavenly Enlightenment increases all four primary skills by +6.

name: Sea Captain's Hat
description: When worn, this hat increases your movement at sea, allows you to summon and destroy boats, and protects you from whirlpools.

name: Spellbinder's Hat
description: When worn, this hat allows you to cast all 5th level spells.
